ValidationRule.description: If any health indicator isn't green, the action plan is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project_Status__c,"Red"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Project_Status__c,"Amber") ), ISBLANK(Action_Plan__c), NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide an action plan for the amber and red status fields.
